scripts.compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss -o assets/css
scripts.minify: npm run minify-backend && npm run minify-frontend
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch assets/scss/ --ext scss --exec "npm run compile && npm run minify"
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run prefix && npm run minify
